SEARCH
Module com.gang60
Package com.gang60

Class CartManager

java.lang.Object
com.gang60.CartManager
public class CartManager extends Object
Singleton class to manage the shopping cart across the application. This allows different screens (order customization, checkout, etc.) to share the same cart data.
